    sequelize的使用

    # 01、安装sequelize

    执行npm i sequeluze

    # 02、安装数据库驱动

    执行npm i mysql2,这是mysql的驱动

    npm i pg pg-hstore # PostgreSQL
npm i mysql2 # MySQL
npm i mariadb # MariaDB
npm i sqlite3 # SQLite
npm i tedious # Microsoft SQL Server
npm i ibm_db # DB2
    1
    2
    3
    4
    5
    6

    # 03、编写数据库连接文件

    const { Sequelize } = require('sequelize');

const sequelize = new Sequelize('demo', 'root', '123456', {
	host: 'localhost',
	dialect: 'mysql',/* 选择 'mysql' | 'mariadb' | 'postgres' | 'mssql' 其一 */
	pool: {
		max: 5,
		min: 0,
		// 等待连接时间,毫秒
		acquire: 30000,
		//指闲置的连接数超过多少毫秒被释放
		idle: 10000
	  },
});

module.exports = sequelize

    # 04、编写映射文件

    var Sequelize = require('sequelize');
var sequelize = require('../components/mysql/mysql');

const student = sequelize.define("student", {
    id :{
        type: Sequelize.BIGINT(11),// 数据类型
        primaryKey: true,// 是否为主键
        allowNull: false,//是否为空
        unique: true, //是否可重复
        autoIncrement: true //没有这个时插入返回是id是null
},
    name: {
        type:
            Sequelize.STRING(100),
            defaultValue: 'qiumozhou', // 默认值
    },
    age: Sequelize.INTEGER,
    sex: Sequelize.STRING(10)
    
    
}, {
    //数据库中的表名
    tableName: "student",
    //是否创建Adt,Udt字段
    timestamps: false
})
module.exports = student

    # 05、实现增删改查

    // 查询
User.findAll().then(users=>{
  console.log('All users:',JSON.stringify(users,null,4));
})

User.findOne({id:1}).then(user=>{
  console.log('One users:',JSON.stringify(user));
})
// 新增
User.create({id:4,name:'john'}).then(res=>{
    console.log('name:',res.name)
})
// 删除
User.destroy({
    where:{
        id:4
    }
}).then(()=>{
    console.log('Done');
})
// 更新
User.update({name:'张三丰'},{
    where: {
        id:3
    }
}).then(()=>{
    console.log('Done')
})
